abstract: Insurers in four states where premium rates are reviewed by federal government push for raises; Obama administration will face pressure to contain costs while preserving competition, putting key feature of Affordable Care Act to test.
lead_paragraph: A federal review process intended to keep premiums down is being tested in Missouri, Oklahoma, Texas and Wyoming, where companies have requested big increases.

headline.main: Insurers, Pushing for Higher Rates, Challenge Key Component of Health Law
headline.print_headline: Insurers, Pushing for Higher Rates, Challenge Key Component of Health Law
